relation: Versions 2.89 and 3.37 must be avoided. Most version from 3.15 and onwards should work. Latest CGI versions cause problems.
This version included in Perl 5.9.5. File::Temp needs to be updated on RedHat 5 and CentOS 5.
Needed by the WysiwygPlugin for WYSIWYG editing
Needed by the WysiwygPlugin for WYSIWYG editing
Needed to install extensions in TWiki configure
textBeforeTable: CPAN modules are used by TWiki: The following Perl TWiki:TWiki.HowToInstallCpanModules for detailed information on how to install CPAN libraries See Most of the CPAN libraries listesd below are part of a standard Perl installation so you most likely have them all! Required CPAN Modules Apache is well supported; see TWiki:TWiki.InstallingTWiki#OtherWebServers for other servers Web server • Unix: cron • Windows: cron equivalents Cron/scheduler Zip archive command line utility. Used by the BackupRestorePlugin to create and restore from backups. zip Modify command line parameters in configure if you use non-GNU grep programs GNU fgrep, egrep For upgrades only: GNU patch is required when using the TWiki:Codev.UpgradeTWiki
textAfterTable: Optional CPAN Modules The following Perl modules may be used by TWiki: See TWiki:TWiki.HowToInstallCpanModules for detailed information on how to install CPAN libraries Module Preferred version Description Archive::Tar   May be required by the Extensions Installer in configure if command line tar or unzip is not available Authen::SASL   Used for SMTP Authentication CGI::Cookie >=1.24 Used for session support CGI::Session >=3.95 Used for session support Crypt::SMIME >=0.09
